com.paly.service.impl

类 SubsectionServiceImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.paly.service.impl.BaseServiceImpl<Subsection>
      • com.paly.service.impl.SubsectionServiceImpl
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    BaseService<Subsection>, SubsectionService

    @Service(value="subsectionService")
public class SubsectionServiceImpl
extends BaseServiceImpl<Subsection>
implements SubsectionService
    子章节Service实现
    作者:
    luohuaming
